page.title: 12HOUSING (DEFFORD)
page.content: { Defford}is a peaceful village with a great variety of housing. the ages vary considerably. Most of the homes are post{1945.}There are a few 19th century and fewer still before that date. Some of the later 20th century are faked to look like 18th century houses. Many of the homes in the village are owned by the local council. Despite their age the pre-twentieth century houses appear to be in better condition than the later buildings. {Housing Type } Detached House 59% Semi-detached 16% Terraced 6% Bungalow 19% {Ownership} Council Housing 13% Owner-occupied 87%
